name: Snackbar

props.name: open
props.description: Controlled open state – omit for uncontrolled

props.name: onClose
props.description: Called when the snackbar has fully hidden

props.name: autoHideDuration
props.description: Auto-hide after N ms – `null` disables (default = 4000 ms)

props.name: message
props.description: Convenience message when no children supplied

props.name: noStack
props.description: Disable the internal flex stack (children render 1:1)

props.name: preset
props.description: One or many style-preset names registered via `definePreset()`

bestPractices: Keep messages short and specific. Snackbars confirm actions or provide brief status; avoid long instructions or multi‑step interactions.
Place them consistently, typically bottom center/right depending on platform.
Offer a single, clear action when needed; prefer undo when appropriate.
Respect motion and timing. Use `autoHideDuration` for transient messages (3–6s typical); longer durations should be deliberate.
Don’t stack excessively. Queue messages when necessary; ensure important ones aren’t missed.
Keep focus behavior intact. Snackbars shouldn’t steal focus; any action button must be keyboard reachable.
Style via tokens/presets. Use theme colors for status (e.g., `primary` / `error`) and consolidate variants with `preset`.
